main - package main
 
Main - Class in main
From this site you can convert .mp3/.aac/.m4a into .wav/.midi http://media.io/it/ http://audio.online-convert.com/ The best imho

MidiSequenceCreationStrategy - Class in model
A MidiTrackBuilder implements the logic for create a midi track from a list of GrooveValues
MidiSequenceCreationStrategy() - Constructor for class model.MidiSequenceCreationStrategy
 
MidiSongPlayer - Class in controller.songplayer
A midi song player take a midi track and play them this class exhibits method for managing the reproduction (play, stop, pause...) and the infos of a midi track see also controller.songplayer
MidiSongPlayer(Sequence) - Constructor for class controller.songplayer.MidiSongPlayer
 
MissingIcon - Class in view.config
The "missing icon" is a white box with a black border and a red x.

MusicPlayer - Interface in controller.musicplayer
A music player is something that take different format song from a playlist and reproduce them This interface extends the interface Player and Observable
MusicPlayerFactory - Class in controller.musicplayer
A Factory for creating the different type of music player
MusicPlayerModel - Interface in model
This interface rappresent the model of a music player
MusicPlayerPanel - Class in view.panels
Personalized JPanel for the PlayerPanel, this class "handles" GUI where are situated the functions for playing and pausing of a chosen song.
MusicPlayerPanel(MusicPlayer) - Constructor for class view.panels.MusicPlayerPanel
Default build for this object, creates a raedy to use Music Player Panel with the given controller
MusicPlayerTester - Class in test
This is an automatic test with JUnit for the MusicPlayer
MusicPlayerTester() - Constructor for class test.MusicPlayerTester
 
MyFileChooser - Class in view.model
A personalized file chooser with the specifed selection mode and multiple selection by default.
MyFileChooser(int, MyFileFilter.ExtensionStrategy) - Constructor for class view.model.MyFileChooser
 
MyFileFilter - Class in view.model
A File filter class personalized for .midi, .mid and .wav class with already implemented a FilenameFilter
MyFileFilter(MyFileFilter.ExtensionStrategy) - Constructor for class view.model.MyFileFilter
A constructor for the MyFileFilter class that take in input an ExtensionStrategy
MyFileFilter.ExtensionStrategy - Enum in view.model
The strategy from which choose the wanted filter
